item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...From The Vaults Volume 1 (#148)
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
PODCAST 148 : The Risky Presents From The Vaults Part.1
Our man Risky is back on a new tip this week, as we take you way back in the day of D&B... Introducing a new podcast which brings classic tunes from back in the day. Expect tunes from BCUK, Omni Trio, Krust, Shy FX & Phantom Audio. Listen up!
1) Bad Company - Planet Dust (Prototype Recordings) (2001) 2) Krust - Warhead (Ram Trilogy Remix) (V Recordings) (1999) 3) Dillinja - Hard Noize (Test) (1998) 4) Phantom Audio - Remote Control (Timeless Recordings) (2000) 5) Pendulum - Vault (31 Records) (2003) 6) Shimon - Hush Hush (RAM Raiders Part.3) (RAM Records) (2001) WHAT THE F*** IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION! 7) Alex Reece - Pulp Fiction (Metalheadz) (1995) 8) Roni Size - It's Jazzy (Chronic) (1997) 9) Shy Fx - Wolf (Ebony) (1996) 10) Nookie - Gonna Be Alright (Foul Play Remix) (Reinforced Records) (1995) 11) Foul Play - Music Is The Key (Moving Shadow) (1994)
FOLLOW THE RISKY ON TWITTER... www.twitter.com/therisky

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Future Sounds & Mutated Forms in the mix (#147)
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
SHOW 147: THE RISKY Presents Future Sounds & Mutated Forms In The Mix (#147)
The Risky drops the pressure in this weeks podcast, feeling the World Cup vibes! With tracks by the likes of Optical, Fresh, LSB, Sigma, Matrix & Futurebound and Kabuki, and a guest mix by Mutated Forms, as usual this podcast is not to be missed!
FUTURE SOUNDS Q-Bik – The Boxer Sigma (ft. Jenna G) – Baltimore (instrumental mix) (Breakbeat Kaos) Metrik – Lightspeed (D&B Summer Slammers LP Sampler) (Viper) LSB – All Of My Love (Spearhead) Kabuki – Rhodesia (Warrior Soul LP) (V) WHAT THE **** IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION The Upbeats – Patience (Unique Artists Volume 1) Matrix & Futurebound (ft. Sylo) – The Edge (Futurebound’s VIP 2010 mix) (Headroom EP) Fresh – Talkbox (Kryptonite LP) (Breakbeat Kaos) Optical – Catdog (Unique Artists Volume 1)
IN THE MIX: Mutated Forms

The Risky (twitter.com/therisky) brings the noise as always with this weeks massive podcast. Expect fresh beats from Fresh, Culture Shock, Delta Heavy, Spectrasoul, Kabuki & EZ Rollers. Dark master Skynet passes through with this weeks sickening mix!
Utah Jazz – Bunny Boiler (Vintage LP) Kabuki - Generation X aka Struggle ft (paul st hilaire) (Warrior Soul LP) (V Records) EZ Rollers - Fears and Tears SAVAGE REHAB – JAZZMAN (Liquid V) Killa Kela - Everyday (Q-BIK Remix) Spectrasoul - Glimpse ft D Bridge (Shogun Audio)

1. Voyager - Stakka & Skynet - Skynet Vip (Forthcoming On Audio Blueprint)
2. Serpent - Skynet - Sentient LP
3. Decoy - Stakka & Skynet
4. Hal - Stakka & Skynet - Hidden Agenda Remix

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Future Sounds & Need For Mirrors in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS... FUTURE SOUNDS & NEED FOR MIRRORS IN THE MIX
The Risky weighs in with this weeks knockout Podcast... Packed with new tracks by Original Sin, D-Bridge, Skream, Nero, DC Breaks & Utah Jazz. Rounded off with an epic mix by hotly tipped duo - Need For Mirrors.
FUTURE SOUNDS
Nero - Electron (MTA) Capone - Back To Detroit (TEST) DC Breaks - Babylon (Halo EP) (Viper Recordings) Original Sin - Back For More (Image) Hadouken! - Mic Check (Camo & Krooked Remix)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
Utah Jazz - Quincy (Pharcyde Vocal VIP) Total Science & SPY - Above The Clouds (Shogun Audio) Capone - Fly Away (TEST) Bachelors of Science - Ripsaw (Warehouse Dayz LP) (Horizons Music) D-Bridge Instra mental Skream - Acacia Avenue (Autonomic)
NEED FOR MIRRORS IN THE MIX 1: Need For Mirrors - Low Tide - Nu Directions 2: Need For Mirrors - Stance - 31 RECS Dub 4: Need For Mirrors - Scar Tissue - Dub 5: Need For Mirrors - Sleaze Bag - Dub 7: Need For Mirrors - Trip Up - Dub 8: Need For Mirrors - Screen Play - Dub 9: Need For Mirrors & Zero T - Tilt - Shogun Ltd 10: Kabuki & Jeru The Damaja - Watch Your Step (Need For Mirrors Remix) - V Recordings 11: Need For Mirrors & KIAT - BAD FELLAS - 31 Records 12: Need For Mirrors - Gallows - Shogun dub
FROM THE VAULTS Dom&Roland - Imagination (Moving Shadow)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Future Sounds & Inside Info in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
D&BA : The Risky presents... Future sounds & Inside Info in the mix
The Risky is back after a hectic D&BTV Live on Wednesday. This week we bring you one of the stars of the show, Inside Info. Packed with new dubs to feed your ravenous D&B appetite, including new bits from Rockwell, Ed Rush, Sabre and many more...
01. Spor - Halogen (Lifted Music) 02. Ed Rush - Book of Sight (Virus) 03. DaVIP & Encode - Vamonos (Breed 12inches) 04. Legion - Beyond (Sine Language) 05. Joe Syntax - Mimi (Qilin Music) WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION 06. Sabre - A Wandering Journal (Rockwells Club Mix) (Critical) 07. Heist - Over Again (Captured EP) (Metalheadz) 08. Hybris - The Cleaner (Critical) 09. Noisia - Thursday (Split The Atom LP) INSIDE INFO IN THE MIX UNSIGNED TALENT 10. Second Coming - Helicopter in my Garden FROM THE VAULTS 11. Teebee - Silent Depths (Through The Eyes Of A Scorpion LP)

item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS... THE PAST DECADE OF DRUM&BASS PART 2 (2003 - 2005)
The Risky returns from down under to deliver the second installment of the 'Decade of Drum&Bass' series. Spanning from 2003 - 2005, checkout this massive selection including tracks from Fresh, Pendulum, Sub Focus, Calibre, Zinc and many many more!
2003 Pendulum - Vault (31 Records) Sub Focus - Down The Drain (Frequency) RAM Trilogy - Screamer (RAM Records) Hive - Neo (Violence Recordings) Keaton & Hive - The Plague (Renegade Hardware) Technical Itch & Kemal - The Calling (Moving Shadow) Distorted Minds - T-10 (Kaos Recordings) Twisted Individual - Bandwagon Blues (Formation Records) Fresh - Signal (RAM Records) Rawhill Cru - Mo' Fire (Bad Company Remix) (BC Recordings)
Total Science & Baron - Nosher (Baron VIP) (CIA Ltd) Ebony Dubsters - Ra! (Ebony Dubs) Roni Size (featuring Rahzel) - Out Of Breath (Full Cycle) Marcus Intalex & ST Files - Outaspace (Soul:R) Badmarsh & Shri - Signs (Calibre Remix) (HB 003) D.Kay & Epsilon - Barcelona (BC Authorised) Un-cut - Midnight (M.I.S.T VIP) (Un-Cut)
2004 D-Bridge & Vegas - True Romance (Metalheadz) Logistics - Together (The Future Sound Of Cambridge EP - Vol.1)(Hospital Records) Calibre & Singing Fats - Drop It Down (Signature Recordings) DJ Zinc - Ska (Remix) (True Playaz) Concord Dawn - Don't Tell Me (Timeless Recordings) Fresh - Floodlight (Dogs On Acid) Pendulum - Back To You (Timeless Recordings) Pendulum - Masochist (Breakbeat Kaos) Pendulum - Another Planet (Breakbeat Kaos) Keaton & Hive - Bring It On (Violence Recordings) Ed Rush & Optical - Bacteria (Pendulum Remix) (Virus) Drumsound & Bassline Smith - Odyssey (Prototype)
2005 Chase & Status - Love's Theme (Bingo) MC Conrad & Makoto - Golden Girl (Good Looking Records) Artificial Intelligence - Desperado (V Recordings) Shy Fx - Plastic Soul (Bingo) Shy Fx & T Power - Feelings (Digital Soundboy Recordings) Total Science - Defcom 69 (Metalheadz) Noisia - Block Control (Moving Shadow) Konflict - Messiah (Spor Remix) (Renegade Hardware) Pendulum & Fresh Feat. Spyda & Tenor Fly - Tarantula (Breakbeat Kaos) The Prodigy - Voodoo People (Pendulum Remix) (XL Recordings) Sub Focus - X-Ray (RAM Records) D.Kay & DJ Lee - Tuning (Metalheadz)

item.title: D&BA : A.M.C presents... The Risky is on Holiday
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
A.M.C PRESENTS THE RISKY IS ON HOLIDAY
With The Risky still on holiday down under, we ask A.M.C to step up to the plate and host the first Drum&BassArena podcast of 2010. Expect some big tunes as A.M.C treats us to some of the heaviest and freshest beats around at the moment.
01. Eyes Closed - Netsky 02. My House VIP - Q Bik 03. Around You - Q Bik 04. Circuit Board - Stanza 05. Love Affair - K Dan & Jaybee 06. Stay To Long - Plan B Pendulum Remix 07. Could This Be Real - Sub Focus DNB Mix 08. Drunken Fool - Taxman 09. F Word - Twisted Individual Zen Remix COMPETITION 10. So Be It - Smash Bros 11. The Isocortex - Seizmic 12. Response - Inside Info, Kiro & 59 Crime 13. Mean To An End - Zeal & Litta 14. Slytone - Amoss 15. League Of Shadows - A.M.C 16. Time To Remember - Thorne Remix 17. Orthodox - Anile 18. Code 9 - DBR 19. Breathe - Skeptical
FOLLOW THE RISKY ON TWITTER... www.twitter.com/therisky

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents... D Minds in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS D MINDS IN THE MIX
The Risky steps up to the plate once again to present the podcast, bringing you the heaviest tracks around at the moment, including sounds from Dillinja, Lemonde, J Majik, Digital and more. D Minds fill the guest mix slot this week.
FUTURE SOUNDS 01. J Majik & Wickaman - Talk To Me (Mosquito) 02. Lemonde - Nobody VIP (Valve Lost Tapes Vol.1) (Valve) 03. Mutated Forms - With You (Grid) 04. HLZ - Get The Blues (Nu Directions) 05. D Minds - T-10 (Gangster Mix - Instrumental Version) (D Style) 06. Rollz - V8 (Formation) 07. DJ Taktix - The Way (Serum Remix) (Apex Recordings) 08. Dillinja - So Special (Valve Lost Tapes Vol.1) (Valve) WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION 09. Digital & Outrage - Eclipse (Backlash Records) 10. Rockwell & Zero Tolerance - Bone Structure (Critical)
D MINDS IN THE MIX
01. Riverside - TC Remix (Ministry) 02. Gun Wager - D Minds - D Style 03. T-10 - D Minds (OS Remix VIP) - D Style 04. Step on - Original Sin - Playaz 05. Let The Story Begin - Sub Focus - Ram 06. Pimp Dont Limp - Original Sin -Playaz 07. Borrowed Time Vip - TC Feat Sub Focus - D Style 08. Warning - Primecuts Feat Dynamite MC - D Style 09. War Face - Jakes (D Minds Remix) - D Style 10. Mr Happy - D Minds & DJ Hazard - Playaz 11. Ho 2 - TC - D Style 12. Magistrate - Ready Now - Stereotype 13. Vapourize - Sub Focus - Ram 14. Maniac Cop - D Minds Feat Ghost Dawg- Stereotype 15. Rhythm - Jakes (D Minds Special) - Hench 16. Tick Fa Tack - DJ Pleasure & Origin - Stereotype 17. Remember - Xample & Lomax - Ram 18. Get Lo - Interface - Audio Zoo 19. T-10 - D Minds (D Minds Gangster Step Remix) - D Style 20. Gun Wager - D Minds - D Style 21. Dope Man - Jakes - Hench 22. Skannerz - Jakes - Hench 23. Rhythm - Jakes - Hench 24. T-10 - D Minds (Chasing Shadow Remix) 25. Ill - Chasing Shadows - Hench 26. Broken String - Tek 1- Hench 27. 1986 Was The Future - Mensah - Hench

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Dom & Roland in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS DOM & ROLAND IN THE MIX
A huge show as The Risky pulls out some of the freshest beats from the likes of Dillinja, J Majik & Wickaman, Original Sin, Heist and many more. To coincide with the release of his massive album, 'No Strings Attached', D&B veteran Dom&Roland makes some serious noise as he fills the guest mix slot on this week's show.
FUTURE SOUNDS Dillinja – So Special (Valve Lost Tapes Vol.1) (Valve) J Majik & Wickaman – Mosquito (Mosquito) Top Cat – Ruffest Gunnark (Chase & Status Remix) (Streetlife) Rollz – Plugged In (Formation) Fugative - Supafly (Drumsound & Bassline Smith Remix) (Data) Heist - Death Star (Sumo Beatz) Original Sin – Accidental Hero (Playaz) COMPETITION: WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE Camo & Krooked – Mindset (Beta) AI (feat. DRS) – Blind Eye (Liquid V) Rox - No Going Back (DC Breaks Remix) (Data) Lethal & The Sect - ubik (Surround Sound) Dom & Roland - Riddim Cultcha (No Strings Attached LP : D&BA Bundle Download) DOM & ROLAND IN THE MIX

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Futurebound in the Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS... FUTUREBOUND IN THE MIX
Another big show from the Drum&BassArena camp as The Risky showcases some of the biggest releases and dubs around at the moment. Futurebound fills the guest mix slot with a massive set celebrating the release of the 'Acts of Madmen' series.
Original Sin - Accidental Hero (Playaz) Xample ft. Jakes - No Respect (Dimensions 4 EP) (RAM Records) Dizzee Rascal - Dirtee Cash (Sub Focus Remix) (Dirteestank Recordings) Drumsound & Bassline Smith - Cold Turkey VIP (Technique) Twisted Individual - F Word (Zen Remix) (Grid Recordings) Delano - Big, Bad & Heavy (Serial Killerz Remix) (Philly Blunt)

Total Science & S.P.Y - Jericho (ClearSkyz) DJ A.M.C - So Much Take Legion - New Earth (Signal of Design EP) (Sine Language) Blokhe4d - Cretin (Bad Taste Vol.3) (Bad Taste) MarkC4C & Bones - Scavenger (Sudden Def) Rockwell - Stay Calm (Noir EP) (Critical)
FUTUREBOUND IN THE MIX
1. Sigma – Hi Top (Ed Rush & Optical Remix) – Viper >> Mono Man – Dirty Games – V 2. DC Breaks – Halo – Viper 3. Fresh – Offworld – BBK 4. ShockOne feat..Spyda – Chronic (V.I.P) – Viper 5. Ed Rush & Optical – Crackball – Virus >> D-Bridge – True Romance (V.I.P) – Headz 6. Ram Trilogy – Screamer (Shimon Remix) – Ram 7. Subfocus – Follow the light – Ram >> Nu Tone – System accappella – Hospital 8. Metrik – Xpander – Viper 9. Matrix & Futurebound V’s Snap – Cult of snap – Ministry 10. Futurebound V’s Brookes Bros – Dawn Treader – BBK 11. Brookes Brothers – Crackdown (Shockone Remix) – Viper 12. Original sin – Pimp Don’t Limp – Playaz 13. Furlonge & Culture Shock – Untitled 14. Xample & Lomax – I Remember – Ram 15. Delta Heavy – Galaxy - Viper

Riya) - Testimony (ClearSkyz) EZ Rollers & Darrison - Keep Jammin dub dBridge - 5th Floor (Exit Records)

THE RISKY PRESENTS OPTICAL IN THE MIX The Risky returns to the hot seat to give us our weekly instalment o the Drum&BassArena Podcast. Including the usual future releases and fresh dubs, this week's show features Virus legend, Optical with a hectic mix to get your teeth into.

Q-Bik - My House VIP (Planet Funk Recordings) dub Rollz - Plugged In (Formation) dub Roni Size - Wind Rush (Heist Remix) (V Records) Northern Lights - In and Out (Grid) dub Original Sin - Kiss (Playaz) Netsky - Eyes Closed (Grid) dub D-Bridge - Inner Disbelief (Exit Records) Consequence - Life Is Timing (feat. item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Sub Focus in the Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS...SUB FOCUS IN THE MIX
One of the most highly anticipated albums of the year has arrived, Sub Focus releases his debut self entitled album to huge critical acclaim, and The Risky invites the man himself to take on the Drum&BassArena Podcast mix...All this and the usual bassy goodness the Drum&BassArena podcast is known for.
FUTURE SOUNDS
Sub Focus - Smooth (RAM Records) S.P.Y - Full Metal Jacket - dub Maldini feat. Sylo - Oceanic (Bad Taste Vol.3) Mark C4C - Bones - Scavenger (Sudden Def) DJ Marky & S.P.Y - Riff Raff (Digital Soundboy) Original Sin - Therapy (Playaz) Twisted Individual - Crap Rinse Out (Serum Remix) (Grid) Zed Bias - Neighbourhood (Logistics Remix) Snap - Cult of Snap (Matrix & Futurebound Remix) Bertie Blackman - Byrds Of Prey (DC Breaks Remix)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
SUB FOCUS IN THE MIX
Sub Focus - Let the Story Begin (Ram) >>>Ram Trilogy - Screamer (Ram) Sub Focus - Timewarp VIP (Ram) Deadmau5 - Ghosts n Stuff (Sub Focus Remix) (Mau5trap) Sigma - Front 2 Back (Life) Sub Focus - Follow the Light (Ram) High Contrast - If We Ever (Hospital) Original Sin - R Bass (Playaz) Logistics - Platinum (Hospital) Sub Focus - Splash (Ram) Culture Shock - Footloose (Ram) Noisia and Spor - Falling Through (Vision) Sub Focus - Smooth (Ram) Xample and Lomax - Remember (Ram) Noisia - Deception (Ram) Dj Fresh - Hypercaine (BBK) >>>The Prodigy - Voodoo People (Pendulum Remix) (XL) Sub Focus - Operator (Ram) Dminds - T-10 (Gangsta step Remix) (D-style) Sub Focus - Rock It (Ram) Orignal Sin - Your Love (Playaz) Sub Focus - Vapourise (Ram) TheProdigy - Take me to the hospital (Sub FocusRemix) (Take me to the hospital)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...DJ Rap 'Propa Talent History' Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
The Risky presents... DJ Rap 'Propa Talent History' Mix
Featuring huge new tunes from J Majik & Wickaman, DJ Vapour, C4C, Break and many more, The Risky treats us to a carnival of sounds with this week's podcast. A very special guest mix as DJ Rap compiles a 'Propa Talent History' set for us to reminisce to.
FUTURE SOUNDS
Delano - Big, Bad & Heavy (Serial Killerz Remix) (Philly Blunt) dub J Majik & Wickaman - Flatline (Infrared) (Drum&BassArena Anthems 2009) dub DJ Vapour - Cut Paper (36hertz LP) dub DJ Prime Cuts feat. Dynamite MC - Warning (D*Minds Remix) (Dstyle) Camo & Krooked - Vampires VIP (Mainframe) dub C4C - Stranglehold (Virus) dub Cern - Dark Before Dawn (Cylon UK) Break - People R Different (Critical Sound LP) (Critical) Rockwell - Underpass (Critical Sound LP) (Critical) Jubei - Entrapment (Metalheadz)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
DJ RAP 'PROPA TALENT HISTORY' MIX 1. Digable Bass original - DJ Rap & Aston (Propa Talent) 2. Roughest Gunark feat Top Cat - DJ Rap Remix (Fashion Records) 3. Spiritual Aura - DJ Rap (DJ recordings / Propa Talent) 4. I'm So (In Love With You) feat Blu - DJ Rap Remix (Labello Blanco) 5. Drummin - & Bassin - Feat Fast Eddie - DJ Rap & Fast Eddie (Propa Talent) 6. Informer feat Top Cat - DJ Rap & Topcat (Propa Talent) 7. Intelligent Woman feat Outlaw Candy - DJ Rap & Outlaw Candy (Propa Talent) 8. The Lickshot feat Hooligan - DJ Rap & Hooligan (Propa Talent) 9. Girlchild feat Buju Banton - DJ Rap Remix (Fashion Records) 10. Get Under - DJ Rap & Aston (Propa Talent)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Zero T '10 Years Deep' Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY presents... Zero T '10years Deep' Mix The Risky (D&BA Founder) heads up another packed show featuring fresh dubs from S.P.Y, J Majik & Wickaman, TK and more. Zero T takes control of the guest mix, treating us to an extra special session, playing his back catalogue from the last decade.
FUTURE SOUNDS J Majik & Wickaman - Jump (Mosquito LP) (Infrared) dub Rollz - V8 (Formation) dub Cause4Concern - Blabbermouth (Virus) dub Digital - Dirty Money (Amit & Outrage Remix) (Function Records) dub Bal - The Trendy Tune (Out There EP) (Influence Records) dub S.P.Y - Moon Patrol (Metalheadz) dub TK - Elsewhere dub Disaszt - Together (DC Breaks Remix) (Mainframe) dub Hazard - Wicked So (Playaz) Sub Focus - Vapourise (Sub Focus LP) (RAM)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
ZERO T '10 YEARS DEEP' MIX 1. Zero T + Beta 2 - Minder (Reinforced 2000) 2. Total Science - Zanzibar [Zero T + Beta 2 Rmx] (CIA LTD 2002) 3. Zero T + Rohan - User Deadly (Liquid V 2006) 4. Calibre, Zero T + Beta 2 - Cheap + Nasty (Advanced 2001) 5. Zero T + Beta 2 - Secada [Commix VIP] (Unreleased 2005) 6. Zero T - Big Boss (Commercial Suicide 2001) 7. Calibre + Zero T - Waterfall VIP (Unreleased 2006) 8. Zero T - Natural Selection (Subtitles 2003) 9. Naphta - One Squeeze/Out Of Time [Zero T's One Time Remix] (Bassbin 2003) 10.Zero T + Beta 2 - Bizzy Time (Advanced 2002) 11.Roni Size + Die - Its A Jazz Thing [Zero T's Mellow Mix] (Unreleased 2003) 12.Zero T + Beta 2 - Layd Off (Defunked 2004) 13.Zero T + Beta 2 - New Dawn (Bassbin 2000) 14.Zero T + Beta 2 - 5 Spot (Innerground 2006) 15.Zero T + Beta 2 - Perseverance (Liquid V 2006) 16.Calibre + Zero T - One Word (Liquid V 2004) 17.Zero T ft Steo - Refusal (Integral 07) 18.Zero T + Mosus - Monarch (Soul:r 08) 19.Dillinja - Sky [Zero T Remix] (V Recordings 2008) 20.Mark Broom aka Visitor - Basement [Naphta v Zero T Remix] (Unreleased 1999) 21.Calibre + Zero T - Still (Signature 05) 22.Calibre + Zero T - What I Feel (Signature 06)
ESSENTIAL DOWNLOAD TRACK: Nero - Do You Wanna (Acts of Mad Men Part.2) (Viper)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...DJ Vapour in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS DJ VAPOUR IN THE MIX
The Risky kicks off another high energy show with Subfocus' remix of Prodigy's 'Take Me to the Hospital'. Also, as we welcome '36 Hertz Recordings' imprint into our download store, label frontman DJ Vapour treats us to an hour long podcast mix.
The Prodigy - Take Me To The Hospital (Subfocus Remix) (Take Me To The Hospital) dub Brookes Brothers - Crackdown (Shockone remix) (Acts Of Mad Men LP) (Viper) dub J Majik & Wickaman – Feel About You (Infrared) (Drum&BassArena Summer Selection) dub Dillinja – Shiners (Valve) Heist - Sentinel Warning (dub) Maldini & Vegas – Basket Case (Bad Taste) (dub) 4 Hero – Kirks Nightmare - Mysterons Remix (Randall & DJ Vapour) (Stepback Sessions Vol.2)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE
DJ VAPOUR IN THE MIX 01 - DJ Vapour - untitled - dub 02 - Bladerunner - Mercenary dub - 36 Hertz dub 03 - DJ Vapour - One inch punch - 36 Hertz dub 04 - Steppa & Kitcha - Untitled 4/4 - 36 Hertz dub 05 - DJ Vapour - Sting in the tail - 36 Hertz 06 - HLZ - Clampdown - 36 Hertz dub 07 - Hades - The break (Serum remix) - 36 Hertz 08 - DJ Vapour - Step in the gutter - 36 Hertz dub 09 - DJ Vapour - No smoke - Rufige 10 - DJ Madd - To the massive - 36 Hertz 11 - DJ Vapour - Terminated - 36 Hertz 12 - DJ Vapour - Cut paper - 36 Hertz dub 13 - DJ Vapour - Transmissions - dub 14 - DJ Vapour - Music to fight to - dub 15 - DJ Vapour & Jem one - Promises promises - Digital soundboy dub 16 - Niskala - Dive - 36 Hertz 17 - Dan Miracle - Hyperbolic time chamber - dub

item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS...EZ ROLLERS 'R15' IN THE MIX Back with huge dubs from D Bridge, J Majik & Wickaman and S.P.Y, The Risky presents another big show. This week mix duty falls to the EZ Rollers, who treat us to 15 tracks, from 15 years in 15 minutes.
FUTURE SOUNDS D-Bridge - Inner Disbelief (Exit) Intelligent Manners - If You Want My Love (Allsorts) Fresh feat. MC Darrison - All That Jazz (Remix) (V Recordings) J Majik, Wickaman & Peshay - Jump (dub) DV8 - Birds Flying High (dub) Kox - Its OK (S.P.Y Remix) (CIA)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
EZ ROLLERS '15TRACKS FROM 15YEARS IN 15 MINUTES' IN THE MIX 1. Believe - Moving Shadow Records 2. Retro - Moving Shadow Records 3. Walk This Land - Moving Shadow Records 4. Tough At The Top - Moving Shadow Records 5. Science Funktion - Moving Shadow Records 6. RS2000 - Moving Shadow Records 7. Back To Love - Moving Shadow Records 8. Crowd Rocker - Intercom Recordings 9. Ready For Love - V Recordings 10. Bellagio - Intercom Recordings 11. Rancho Notorious - Intercom Recordings 12. Happy Now - Intercom Recordings 13. Lets Give In - Intercom Recordings 14. Jackie Mittoo - Dub 15. Here I Am - Mastermind Records

item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS...DRUMSOUND & BASSLINE SMITH IN THE MIX...
The Risky presents another packed show of drum&bass goodness, with brand new tracks from Friction & K Tee, Audio, Jaydan, Fresh and more. This installment sees Drumsound & Bassline Smith in the mix, as they celebrate a decade of Technique Recordings.
FUTURE SOUNDS Fresh - Heavyweight (Digital Soundboy) Serum & Bladerunner - Warriors (Zombie) J Majik & Wickaman - Flatline Now (dub) DC Breaks - Polarbear (Viper) Audio - Pandorum (Virus) Friction & K-Tee - Set If Off (Shogun Audio) Vital Elements - Humanoid (Zombie) Jaydan - Pull Up VIP (Propaganda)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Camo & Krooked in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
THE RISKY PRESENTS... CAMO & KROOKED IN THE MIX
Another dose of the Drum&BassArena podcast. The Risky is in place to share new dubs from Subfocus, Lynx, S.P.Y, J Majik & Wickaman and more...This week's guest mix is by Austrian duo Camo & Krooked.
FUTURE SOUNDS J Majik, Wickaman & Peshay - Jump (dub) Total Science - Nosher (Marky & S.P.Y Remix) (Advanced Recordings) Camo & Krooked - Get Funky VIP (dub) Dillinja - Love Child (Valve) Gappa G & Hyper Hypa - Information Centre (Bladerunner Remix) J Majik & Wickaman - Flatline Now (dub) Sigma - Hi Top (Ed Rush & Optical Remix) (Viper) Subfocus - Rock It (RAM Records) Bachelours of Science - Song For Lovers (Lynx Remix) (Horizons)

item.title: D&BA : The Risky presents...Spor in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Featuring huge forthcoming beats from Subfocus, TC, Heist, S.P.Y, Friction and more, The Risky (D&BA FOUNDER) hosts another packed Drum&BassArena Podcast. This week we have Spor in the mix, showing us why he is one of the admired artists in the scene at the moment.
THE RISKY PRESENTS...SPOR IN THE MIX
FUTURE SOUNDS DJ Marky & S.P.Y – Days Go Slow (Innerground) Subfocus – Rock It (RAM Records) Friction & K-Tee – The Bleeps (Shogun Audio) DC Breaks - Polarbear (Viper) Tantrum Desire - Here they come (Technique) Subfocus – Follow The Light (RAM Records) Adam Freeland - Under Control (TC Remix) (Marine Parade) Heist - Scrap Yard Dog (Co-Lab)
WHAT THE F**K IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
SPOR IN THE MIX 01. Two Fingers feat. Sway - That Girl (Spor Remix) - Ninja Tune 02. Lomax - Avon Calling - Ram 03. Fresh - Heavyweight - Digital Soundboy 04. Noisia - My World - Ram 05. Spor - Claret's March - Lifted 06. Apex - Entrapment - Lifted 07. Chris S.U. - First Snow - Subtitles 08. Ewun - Screwup (Upbeats Remix) - Lifted 09. Friction & K-Tee - The Bleeps - Shogun Audio 10. Gemini - Down - Breed 12 Inches 11. PLK - Nyquist Theory - Obsessions 12. Ed Rush & Optical - Chubrub - Virus 13. Don Diablo - Hooligans (Spor Remix) - Ministry of Sound 14. Spor - Silver Spaceman - Lifted 15. Upbeats - Binge Drinker - Lifted 16. Spor - Aztec - Shogun Audio

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...Original Sin in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Another heavyweight edition of the Drum&BassArena podcast, presented by The Risky. With a batch of brand new beats from Die & Break, The Rufige Kru, Clipz and more, as well as a dig in the crates to bring you 'From the Vaults'. The guest mix this week is by jump up maven, Original Sin.

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...L plus in the mix

item.description:
Presenting Show 10, with The Risky in the hot seat. Offering two hours of blazing beats and basses, old and new, this week's episode features Slovakian producer L plus with an across the board mix, showing why he is definitely a name to watch in 2009.

item.title: D&BA: Drum&BassArena Awards 2009
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
It’s been 15 years in the making, now for the first time D&BA invites you, a truly global Drum&Bass community to come together and vote for those who deserve to be rewarded.
Voting starts on the 13th April.
CATEGORIES:
BEST DJ BEST MC BEST PRODUCER BEST SINGLE BEST ALBUM BEST LABEL BEST NEWCOMER DJ BEST NEWCOMER MC BEST NEWCOMER PRODUCER BEST EVENT BEST PROMOTER HALL OF FAME
Vote Now @ www.breakbeat.co.uk/awards

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...DJ Ink 'Renegade Hardware Showcase' mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
The Risky (D&BA Founder) heads up the latest Drum&BassArena podcast, treating you to almost two hours of fresh beats and basses, including new tracks from Ed Rush & Optical, Subterra, Twisted Individual, DJ Vapour, Dillinja and more. This week's guest mix is hosted by Renegade Hardware favourite, DJ Ink who takes us on a journey through the old and new.
FUTURE SOUNDS Nero - Sound In Motion (Breakbeat Kaos) DJ Vapour - Paper Cuts (36 Hertz) Subterra - Undertow Ed Rush & Optical - Magical Thinking (Virus) Dillinja - Who You VIP (Willy Wonka Mix) (Valve Downloads)
WHAT THE F*** IS THAT TUNE COMP?
NEW D&B TO DOWNLOAD Dirty Harry - Fools (Ganja Recordings) Twisted Individual - Donkey Punch (Grid Recordings)
GUEST MIX: DJ INK : Renegade Hardware Showcase 01. Future Forces - Dead By Dawn 02. Genotype - Extra Terrestrial 03. Future Cut - Whiplash 04. Future Cut - Stealth 05. Usual Suspects - Spawn Punch (Future Cut rmx) 06. Infinite - Beach Ball 07. Konflict - Roadblock 08. Friction & K Tee - Overtime 09. Konflict - Beckoning 10. Raiden - Faliin' 11. Resonant Evil - Troubleshoot 12. DJ Ink ft. Dylan - Need you 13. Gremlinz - Shattered 14. Loxy & Keaton - Haters 15. Universal Project - Danger Chamber 16. Vicious Circle - Between the Lines 17. Keaton & Hive - Plague (Hive rmx) 18. Chase & Status - Menace 19: Pendulum - Minds eye 20: Noisia - Subdue 21: Sabre & Icicle - Sentry 22: Calyx & Teebee - Desolate 23: Chris Su - The Peak 24: Absolute Zero - The Code (SKC rmx) 25: Konflict - Messiah (Noisia rmx)
FROM THE VAULTS Usual Suspects - Killa Bees (Renegade Hardware) Ink - Murder Ink (Twisted Anger Remix) (Renegade Hardware) Dillinja - Twist 'em Out (Renegade Hardware)

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...Shimon in the mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
The Risky (D&BA Founder) returns to the hot seat as he presents another heavyweight podcast. Tunes inside include new tracks from Ed Rush & Optical, Zen, Jakes and Serum. The extended guest mix is from Audioporn frontman, Shimon, who covers all bases playing some nice dubs as well as the classics that we all love to hear.
FUTURE SOUNDS
Zen Vs Killa Beats - Your Shout (Grid) Ed Rush & Optical - Padded Cells – Travel The Galaxy LP (Virus) Jakes - All About (feat.. TC) (D-Style) Topcat – No Sensi Today (Serum Remix) (Streetlife) Ed Rush & Optical – Temper - Travel The Galaxy LP (Virus)
NEW D&B TO DOWNLOAD
RAM Trilogy – Asylum – Quarks E.P (Audio Porn) Shock One Feat.Reija – Polygon – Shock One E.P (Viper Recordings)
WHAT THE F*** IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
SHIMON IN THE MIX
Shimon - The Shadow Knows DirtyPhonics rmx Subfocus - World of Hurt feat. Takura DirtyPhonics - Vandals Shimon & Andy C - Quest Shimon v Sparfunk - The Smoker Subfocus & Brookes Bros - Late Run Shimon v Disazt - Lightspeed Subfocus - Rock It Lomax - Avon Calling Shimon - Humanism Noisia - My World DirtyPhonics - Quarks Chrissy Chris - Pimp Game Chase & Status - Eastern Jam DirtyPhonics - Zoids DirtyPhonics - Lottery Lomax - Faith Massive Shimon - Hush Hush Ed Rush & Optical - G Force Jesus Deadmouse - Ghosts & Stuff Ram Trilogy - Asylum Noisia - Diplodocus Shimon & Andy C - Nightflight DirtyPhonics - The Secret Xample & Lomax - Contra Shy FX - Bambata rmx Xample & Lomax - Riviera Culture Shock - Gears Ed Rush & Optical - The Kindred Subfocus - VCF Friction & K-Tee - Set It Off Shimon v Matrix - Slip Stream Soulpride -Tool Time 0T - Long Distance Serum - Pass the Buck Lomax - Mercia D Product - Mountain People AudioPorn Dub
FOLLOW THE RISKY ON TWITTER... www.twitter.com/therisky

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...Sigma in the mix

item.description:
The Risky (D&BA Founder) hosts the 100th Drum&BassArena Podcast, this week featuring Sigma in the mix, plus exclusive tracks from Ed Rush & Optical, High Contrast, Fresh, Serum & many more! Also there are Free D&B Downloads for 100 listeners!

item.title: D&BA: The Risky presents...Serum in the Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
The Risky (D&BA founder) is back in the hot seat as he presents Serum in the mix. Serum has quickly made waves within the scene and delivers a driving hour of tearout beats. Also inside The Risky treats us to some future sounds of D&B aswell as digging deep in the crates to deliver some of the classics.
FUTURE SOUNDS Steve Angello & Laidback Luke - Show Me Love (Blame Remix) (Data) Redeyes feat. Grimm – Out Of My Head Ed Rush & Optical – Chub Rub – Travel The Galaxy LP (Virus) Dan Miracle - Blazin Fire VIP (Valve) WHAT THE F*** IS THAT TUNE COMPETITION
FRESH D&B TO DOWNLOAD A-Sides & Deeizm – Just Be (Influx UK Remix) (Allsorts) Twisted Individual – Jelly On A Plate (Zombie)
SERUM IN THE MIX
DRUM&BASSARENA DOWNLOAD TOP TEN
FROM THE VAULTS Ed Rush & Fierce – Locust Konflict – Messiah Adam F - Metropolis

item.title: D&BA: DJ Mosus & MC Stapleton
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Hailing from New Zealand and now based in London, DJ Mosus has taken little time in establishing himself as one of the breakthrough artists in Drum&Bass over the past few years. He lays down this podcast for Drum&BassArena, covering all the fantastic music in the scene at the moment. He describes this mix as highly musical but still with a rolling dancefloor factor. MC Stapleton on hosting duty.
Tracklisting:
01: INSTRA:MENTAL FEAT: D BRIDGE - TRANSLUCENT - DARKESTRAL DUB 02: LOMAX - SO REAL - SOULR 03: INSTRA:MENTAL - PHOTOGRAPH - DARKESTRAL DUB 04: S13 - TELESCOPE - LIQUID V DUB 05: DJ KRUST - SOUL IN MOTION - FULLCYCLE 06: D BRIDGE FEAT STEVE SPACEK - LAST STRAW - EXIT 07: MOSUS & S.P.Y - MY WORLD - 31 RECS DUB 08: CALIBRE - NEW CONS - EXIT 09: UNKNOWN - SINCERE BOOTLEG - WHITE 10: LENZMAN - FADE AWAY - DUB 11: D DRIDGE - ON MY MIND - SOULR 12: LEVEL 2 - GOING BACK - LIQUID V DUB 13: INSTRA:MENTAL - DEAD ZONE - DARKESTRAL DUB 14: S.P.Y - HIDDEN EMOTION - LIQUID V DUB 15: MOSUS & ZERO T - MONARCH - SOULR 16: JONNY L - SIGHT UNSEEN - XL 17: MARCUS INTALEX - SKIZIM - SOULR 18: INSTRA:MENTAL - NO FUTURE - NON PLUS+ DUB 19: NOISIA - STRANGE OWL EXPERIMENT - METAL HEADZ 20: COMMIX - RACK IT - HOSPITAL 21: DJ KRUST - TRUE STORIES - TALKIN LOUD 22: MOSUS & S.P.Y - COLD 909'S - SOULR

item.title: D&BA: Barney Trouble
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Barney Trouble delivers a 'back in the day' mix, influenced by LTJ Bukem's Club night 'Speed' at Mars Bar, started in October 1994. Barney recently remixed 4Hero's 'Mr Kirk's Nightmare' to devastating effect, available to download now from D&BA Download/

item.title: D&BA: Seba
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
This podcast is quite simply about enjoying the vibes and letting the tunes breathe. This deep, minimal mix showcases a host of Seba's own superb productions. Like what you hear? You can grab Seba's brilliant album "Return To Forever" from the D&BA Download store now.
1. seba & paradox feat robert manos - last goodbye (2008 recap) - Paradox music 2. seba & kirsty hawkshaw - devotion - unscheduled 3. seba - untitled - unscheduled 4. seba - special ops - combination records 5. sabre - global - subtitles 6. dbridge - mourning dawn - exit 7. seba - crockett - combination records 8. seba - planetary funk alert 2008 - good looking records 9. nucleus & paradox - L.S.D. jazz

item.title: D&BA: Kasra
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
KASRA SAYS: "To celebrate the release of the All Sounds Electric 2 album on Drum&BassArena Download I thought do a fresh podcast mix for Drum&BassArena. This live studio mix using only vinyl and dubs features some of the latest Critical cuts and future classics as well as fresh slices from my favourite producers and labels. Enjoy."
Catch Kasra at Drum&BassArena's Xmas List @ The Scala, Kings Cross, London, December 5th

item.title: D&BA: DJ Steppa & Tonn Piper
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
After winning the Best Breakthrough DJ Award at the National Drum & Bass Awards last year DJ Steppa is a name you'll be hearing everywhere. With experience and maturity well beyond his years, DJ Steppa boasts an impressive CV across the Drum & Bass movement showing no signs of letting up. Busily working, DJing and producing within the scene he so adamantly pledges his passion to he teams up with MC Tonn Piper and Drum & Bass Arena to give another amazing podcast.

item.title: D&BA: Phetsta
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
After his tours across Australia, New Zealand, USA and more recently Europe, Phetsta's earnt himself a reputation as a tight and energetic crowd pleaser, playing DnB from across the board. Now with D&B Arena he puts out a podcast that will leave you wanting more.

item.title: D&BA: T-Phonic
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Straight out the lab and into the studio Viper recordings new boy 'T-Phonic' showcases his skills for this exclusive podcast for DnB arena. Hosted by Kool fm's very own MC Mekar.
This up front mix is carefully crafted showcasing a few of his own dub plates and a few classics thrown in for good measure, this mix is sure to take you on a journey through every spectrum of drum and bass.
Previously under the name 'Kinetics', T was responsible for the massive 'Back to My Other Life remix' which was the signature tune of Bobby Friction and Nihal's prime time BBC Radio 1 show, getting licensed to their "Presents..."LP selling over 200, 000 copies to date.
His first release on Viper 'Keep Moving'&'Overload' smashed dancefloors world wide with support from the likes of DJ Hype, Matrix, Futurebound, Sigma and J.Majik. His new Viper 12" which features the heavy funked out tracks "You make me feel" and "Spark of a flame" are set to drop in the late autumn of 2008.
Forthcoming releases on Viper V.I.P, Bad Taste, Abstract inc. and Q Recordings. His brand of powerful and eclectic musical drum and bass is seeing him become one of the scenes brightest new talents.
Track listings for dnbarena podcast.
1. TAKE ME AWAY - CHASE & STATUS 2a BACK TO THE JUNGLE - STATE OF MIND 2. FUTUREBOUND vs BROOKES BROS - DAWN TREADER 3. THE DARK INSIDE ME - T-PHONIC 4. PASSIVE AGRESSIVE - BREAK 5a THE NINE - BAD COMPANY 5. TIMEWARP - SUB FOCUS 6. JUDGEMENT - CHASE & STATUS 7. COME AROUND - SIGMA 8. KILLAZ - HAZARD 9. MANKIND - DC BREAKS 10. HOVERCRAFT - ZEN 11a FEELINGS - SHY FX 11. CANT STOP IT - T-PHONIC 12. SNAKE CHARMER - SHIMON vs SPARFUNK 13. SAME OLD BLUES - APEX 14. X-RAY - SUB FOCUS 15. MOVING ON - METRIK 16. DICO DODO - LYNX 17. U MAKE ME FEEL ALRIGHT - T-PHONIC

item.title: D&BA: Redeyes
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Emerging as a DJ on the French Drum&Bass scene in 1999. Redeyes quickly gained recognition for his eclectic selection & tight mixing. This podcast is 90 minutes showcasing his tastes & talents.

item.title: D&BA: NC-17
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Signing their first two hard hitting tracks to Sinuous Recordings in 2004, thereís now no stopping this Toronto based duo who have lined up releases on DSCI4, MAC II, Circle, Sudden Def and just recently signing a single to Andy C Ram Sister label Frequency.

item.title: D&BA: JFB
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
JFB Uk DMC Champion 2007 Runs Ground breaking night Battlejam with 2x Uk Beatbox Champion Beardyman. Apart from being a turntabalist playing a various selection, JFB has a Drum&Bass upbringing & has been playing nights like Movement since 2000.This mix consists of 23 rolling tracks with a few exlucives donated from Ed Solo, some beatjuggling at the beggining and a nice amount of scratching mixed on three decks and 2 seratos live in his bedroom studio, is 50mins long.
Tracklist:
1 : Total Science - Listen 2 : A sides - Tear The Roof Off - Twisted Indivividual Rmx 3 : Futurebound & Brookes Brothers -Dawn Treader 4 : Utah Jazz - Riddim Track 5 : Danny Byrd - From Bath With Love Feat. T-Lace 6 : Total Science - Catch Up 7 : Lynx -Distance Zero 8 : Optimist - High Volume 9 : Dj Panik - Dead Or Alive 10: Metrik - Movin On 11: Danny Byrd - Planet Music V.I.P Feat. Mc Foxy & Adrock 12: JFB & Ed Solo - Milkbottle 13: SpectraSoul - Tectonics 14: Utah Jazz - Cloud Nine 15: Ed Solo & JFB - Chains 16: London Elektricity - Attack Ships On Fire 17: Ed Solo - Checkpoint 18: Metrik - Stranger 19: Red Polo - ComeBooty 20: Wax & Cls - Feeling Good 21: Danny Byrd - Supersized 22: Red Polo - BamBam Booty 23: Pendulum - 9000 Miles

item.title: D&BA: Nu Directions
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Nu Directions head honcho Andy Mystic offers up a mix of 18 past and future classics on Nu Directions and sister label Diverse Products. With the label heading towards its 10 year anniversary this podcast showcases the sound the label has become renowned for. Expect the unexpected.
1. Kubiks & Calculon - Android On Steroids 2. SpectraSoul - Falling Down 3. Hobzee & Zyon Base - Red Letter (Survival Remix) 4. TK - Folklore 5. Notion - Don't Leave 6. Mathematics - Bells 7. Human Factor - Deep Love 8. Bungle & Ney - Leaving Sao Paulo 10. Ste.Luce & DJ Addiction - Come On Try 11. The Fix - Brooklyn 12. Kubiks & Codename - Bitstream 13. Lynx & Flow - The Curse 14. Random Movement & The Insiders - Movin Along 15. Mathematics - Dirt Devil 16. Human Factor - Confessions 17. Deep Inc. - Keep On 18. SpectraSoul - Adoration VIP

Random Movement & The Insiders - Movin Along 15. Mathematics - Dirt Devil 16. Human Factor - Confessions 17. Deep Inc. - Keep On 18. SpectraSoul - Adoration VIP

item.title: D&BA: Shock One
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Coming from a traditionally trained musical background Shockone bring a unique sound to the drum and bass music scene, discovering the sound through artists like Bad Company, Konflict and Ed Rush & Optical.
It was when ShockOneís tune ëSilverscreení dropped at a pendulum return show that things started to really move. Having torn the roof off it wasnít long before Dj Friction had picked it up for his own imprint Shogun audio, backed up with Dropping science this was a debut release that made the world take notice, gaining support from Friction, Andy C and Hype to name a few. Followed by this release was ëItís Oní which featured the musical side of the Duo utilizing live guitars resulting in an energetic party anthem that proved Shockone were more than reeces and amens
On the DJ front Shockones sets have built a reputation for consistently causing uncontrollable body movement, flailing limbs and general frenzied behaviour among crowds. Having played along side the likes of Andy C, Dj Fresh, Pendulum, Dj Friction to name a few, Shockone has proven to be a force to be reckoned with, not only in the studio, but also on stage, always retaining a strong musical element in sets while still keeping the energy at maximum level.

item.title: D&BA: Young AX
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
This is musical d&b at its finest, but still packing enough punch to rock the dancefloor!" (Kmag #61 on Young Ax Higher Ground album).
"I definitely don't like predictable tracks, based on loops and stuff. I want something to happen during the tune. Itís like a live show where someone is playing a wrong note." (Young AX)
1. Young Ax - Soulsearchin' - Beatalistics 2. Kubiks & Lomax - Jacuzzi 9mm - Nu Directions 3. Calibre - Think Again - Signature 4. Young Ax - Higher Ground - Santorin 5. Bassface Sascha & Franksen - Take Over - Beatalistics 6. Young Ax - Let's Go - Santorin 7. TC - Get That Girl - D-Style 8. Syncopix - Travellin' Man - Hospital 9. Camo & Khan - Mr. Mista - SOUL 10. Young Ax - U Got It - Santorin 11. Die (feat. Ben Westbeech) - The Reason Why - Clearskyz 12. Tita Lima - A Conta Do Samba (Human Factor Remix) - Sunrize 13. As the mighty "Hovercraft" shoots straight to the top of the charts at DRUM&BASSARENA DOWNLOAD, Zen teams up with UNCZ (MC's Skibadee, Fun & Harry Shotta) to deliver an hour the good stuff showcasing some seriously big dubs from the Grid Recordings camp.

item.description:
Newly recruited to Radio One's 'In New DJs we trust', D-Code has been on the scene for over a decade. Having produced every remix by Shiva Soundsystem and with tunes rinsed by the likes of Andy C, Fabio and London Elektricity, an Arena podcast has been on the cards for a while.

item.title: D&BA: AMC
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Turntablist supreme DJ AMC steps up for his first DRUM&BASSARENA Podcast. This is 3 deck mayhem at its best. Cramming in an unbelievable 44 tracks, this mix is as fast and furious as they come. A regular fixture for D&BTV Live, AMC's energy and passion for the music is guaranteed to give nothing but good vibes.
01. Void Dweller - Break (Metalheadz) 02. Deadline - Drumsound & Simon Bassline Smith Remix (Function) 03. Beast City - Original Sin VIP (Ganja) 04. Robocop - Taxman Remix (Playaz) 05. Gun Fingers - Dirty Harry (Front Line) 06. Bounty Hunter - Dj Pleasure (Music Hurtz) 07. Power of RA - Ebony Dubsters (Ebony) 08. Cheater Cheater - Original Sin (Ganja) 09. The Bells - Dj Motion (Max Ammo) 10. Nosher - Baron Remix (CIA) 11. Flesh Wound - G Dub Remix (Viper) 12. The Beginning - Moving Fusion (Ram) 13. Goblin - Zinc (Bingo) 14. New Generation - Clipz (Full Cycle) 15. Kombat - Crisis Remix (Dub) 16. Dark Solider - Dj Vapour Remix (Dread) 17. Shadow Boxing - Nasty Habits (31 recs) 18. KDC - Harmful (Dub) 19. Night - Digital Sound Boy Remix (Tempa) 20. Bass Drive - Drum & Bass Republic (Dub) 21. The Code - SKC Remix (Renegade) 22. Bacteria - Pendulum Remix (Virus) 23. Altitude - Break Remix (Shogun) 24. Run Off - Break (Quarantine) 25. Silver Steez - Loxy & Gremlinz (Cylon) 26. The Nine - Bad Company (BC recs) 27. Frontline - Zeal & Litta (Dark Asylum Dub) 28. 8 Bit Bitch - Spor Remix (Evol Intent Recs) 29. Ladies Night VIP - Demo & Cease (Human Imprint) 30. Koeko - Thought (Dub) 31. Darkness - Su3ject Remix (Trick Disc Recs) 32. Loader - Chase & Status (BC Recs) 33. Dial Tone - Zeal & Litta (Dark Asylum Dub) 34. The Break - Hade's (36h Chamber) 35. Franky Mountain - Icicle & Nymfo (Ram) 36. Hardware - Operata M (Dub) 37. Late Nights - Icicle (Critical) 38. Lost & Found - Break (Symmetry Recs) 39. Walking On Mars - Drum & Bass Republic (Dub) 40. Disco Dodo - Lynx (Creative) 41. Watermelon - Ed Rush & Optical (Virus) 42. Shrapnel - Billian (Dub) 43. The Pulse - Bad Company (Prototype) 44. The Apprentice - Proktah (Trust In Music)

A regular fixture for D&BTV Live, AMC's energy and passion for the music is guaranteed to give nothing but good vibes.
01. Void Dweller - Break (Metalheadz) 02. Deadline - Drumsound & Simon Bassline Smith Remix (Function) 03. Beast City - Original Sin VIP (Ganja) 04. Robocop - Taxman Remix (Playaz) 05. Gun Fingers - Dirty Harry (Front Line) 06. Bounty Hunter - Dj Pleasure (Music Hurtz) 07. Power of RA - Ebony Dubsters (Ebony) 08. Cheater Cheater - Original Sin (Ganja) 09. The Bells - Dj Motion (Max Ammo) 10. Nosher - Baron Remix (CIA) 11. Flesh Wound - G Dub Remix (Viper) 12. The Beginning - Moving Fusion (Ram) 13. Goblin - Zinc (Bingo) 14. New Generation - Clipz (Full Cycle) 15. Kombat - Crisis Remix (Dub) 16. Dark Solider - Dj Vapour Remix (Dread) 17. Shadow Boxing - Nasty Habits (31 recs) 18. KDC - Harmful (Dub) 19. Night - Digital Sound Boy Remix (Tempa) 20. Bass Drive - Drum & Bass Republic (Dub) 21. The Code - SKC Remix (Renegade) 22. Bacteria - Pendulum Remix (Virus) 23. Altitude - Break Remix (Shogun) 24. Run Off - Break (Quarantine) 25. Silver Steez - Loxy & Gremlinz (Cylon) 26. The Nine - Bad Company (BC recs) 27. Frontline - Zeal & Litta (Dark Asylum Dub) 28. 8 Bit Bitch - Spor Remix (Evol Intent Recs) 29. Ladies Night VIP - Demo & Cease (Human Imprint) 30. Koeko - Thought (Dub) 31. Darkness - Su3ject Remix (Trick Disc Recs) 32. Loader - Chase & Status (BC Recs) 33. Dial Tone - Zeal & Litta (Dark Asylum Dub) 34. The Break - Hade's (36h Chamber) 35. Franky Mountain - Icicle & Nymfo (Ram) 36. Hardware - Operata M (Dub) 37. Late Nights - Icicle (Critical) 38. Lost & Found - Break (Symmetry Recs) 39. Walking On Mars - Drum & Bass Republic (Dub) 40. Disco Dodo - Lynx (Creative) 41. Watermelon - Ed Rush & Optical (Virus) 42. Shrapnel - Billian (Dub) 43. The Pulse - Bad Company (Prototype) 44. The Apprentice - Proktah (Trust In Music)

item.title: D&BA: Xample
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Having grown up in Bristol, Xample has always been surrounded by the sounds of drum n bass. Having attracted the interest of Andy C and the Ram crew, Xample has fast become one of the drum n bass success stories of 2008. With more releases on Ram in the pipeline, Xample lays down this podcast to give us a preview of what to expect from him in the future.
1.Xample - Automatic (Ram) 2.Clipz - Ugly (Audio Zoo) 3.Zen - Jah Colours RMX (Low Down Deep) 4.Xample - Lowdown VIP (Ram) 5.Icicle & Nymfo - Franky Mountain (Ram) 6.Xample & Lomax - Contra (Ram) 7.Nymfo & Proxima - Headless Housefly (Frequency) 8.Phobia & Jubie - Guillotine (Hardware) 9.Xample - Heaven & Hell RMX (Ram) 10.Danny Byrd & Brookes Brothers - Goldrush (Hospital) 11.TC & Subfocus - Borrowed Time VIP (D Style) 12.Subfocus - Timewarp (Ram) 13.Zen - Double Bobblee (Grid) 14.Xample - Breath & Stop (Frequency)

item.description:
Co-founder of the mighty Viper label, Futurebound has been as busy as anyone in the studio of late. Here he lays down an hour of mayhem and crams in more tunes than you can shake a fist at.
Tracklist

Chase & Status – Judgement (Ram) 21. C4C – Sleeper Cell (C4C) 22. T.C – Driver (D-Style) 23. J-Majik & Wickaman – Fleshwound (G-Dub Remix) (Viper) 24. Shock One – Untitled (Viper) 25. item.title: D&BA: DJ Empress
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
DJ Empress has been smashing clubs worldwide for over eleven years. Hailing from New York, Empress has toured all over Europe and Asia, also having played almost every major city in North America. With such a global reputation, this is a podcast not to be missed.
Tracklist
1. Valium Express - Dose, Trei & Menace 2. Compound - Ed Rush & Optical (Virus Recordings) 3. Womb- Matrix & Futurebound (ViperMetro Recordings) 4. Shadowpath- Axiom & Psidream (Shadowlaw Recordings) 5. Zone Defense- Mindmapper (Crunch Recordings) 6. Survival of the Fittest- NC-17 (Mac 2 Records) 7. Derailed - Dose (Redlight Recordings) 8. Phalanx - Axiom 9. Dawn Treader Master - Brookes Brothers vs Futurebound 10. Scream to the Stars - Concord Dawn & Chris Su 11. Dropout - Cause 4 Concern 12. Tin God - The Upbeats (Uprising Recordings) 13. Dual Processed - Teebee & Calyx ft-Verse 14. Mankind - DC Breaks (VIper Recordings) 15. Swamp Thing - Subfocus (Ram Records) 16. Slug Path - NC-17 (DSCi4) 17. Fleshwound RMX- J Majik & Wickaman (G Dub RMX) (Viper Recordings) 18. The Media is a Joke - Gridlok (CIA Recordings) 19. Words of Wisdom - Dose (Revolution Recordings) 20. The Revenge - Loxy & Munk (X-Tinction Agenda) 21. Disco Dodo - Lynx (Creative Source) 22. Connected - Maldini & Empress (dub) 23. Druggy - Subfocus (Ram Records) 24. Camouflage Relick - Bulletproof & The Upbeats (Cyanide Recordings) 25. Romper - DC Breaks (Viper Recordings)

item.title: D&BA: Bungle
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Following in the footsteps of other legendary Brazilian dance acts DJ Patife and DJ Marky, Bungle is on course to have the same impact as his predecessors, if not more, on the global stage.
Taking time out from his hectic production and DJing schedule (including a tour in May that is going to take him to Paris, Cologne, Moscow, Austria, Poland, Estonia and Chelmsford) Bungle drops an exclusive mix for D&BArena featuring that Brazilian touch you've come to expect.
Tracklist:
1. Human Factor - Japanese Delight 2. Random Movement - Thick Liquid 3. Child Support - Green Cross Code (Bungle remix) 4. Q Project - Tears (Marky & Bungle remix) 5. Amaning & Dubwise - Smash VIP 6. Bungle feat. Total Science & Ayah - Snake Eyes (Bungle VIP) 7. High Contrast - Everything is Different (Calibre remix) 8. Bungle - Good Times 9. Commix - Faceless (Marcus Intalex remix) 10. Break - The Drone 11. Bungle - The Need Of Being Alone 12. Break - Vanishing Point 13. Bungle - Be Like This 14. Mistical - Mistical Dub 15. Omni Trio - Renegade Snares (High Contrast remix) 16. Electrosoul System - Purple Sky 17. Marky & Bungle - Let Me Tell Ya 18. Invaderz - 32bit Jungle 19 Noisia & Black Sun Empire - Infusion 20. Klute - Tranceformat 21. Commix - Belleview 22. Mikrob - Never Win

item.title: D&BA: Logan D and Evil B
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Logan D has risen to prominence in the last few years becoming one of the best up and coming DJs in the scene as well as running his successful label, Low Down Deep Recordings and presenting his own bi-weekly Kool FM Show. Catch this awesome podcast as Logan treats us to some highly anticipated Low Down Deep dubplates, with Evil B controlling the mic.
Tracklist
1. Jah Colours - Mutated Forms - ( Zen remix ) Low Down Deep Dub 2. Cheater Cheater - Original Sin - Frontline 3. Rah - Shy FX - Ebony Dub 4. Double Bobble - Zen - Grid 5. item.title: D&BA: Bachelors Of Science
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Coming straight out of San Francisco, newcomers Bachelors of Science have already become a well known name in the global dnb scene with their unique rolling, liquid sound. The duo, originally hailing from the UK and New Zealand, have had strong support from the likes of LTJ Bukem, Brian Gee, Bailey and High Contrast after dropping a a string of strong releases on Horizons Music. With their debut album 'Science Fiction' landing last month to critical acclaim they take time out to put together this excellent mix for Drum & Bass Arena.
Tracklist:
1. Death Cab For Cutie - Brothers On A Hotel Bed (Bachelors Of Science Remix) 2. Mutt and Redeyes - Sugar 3. Bachelors Of Science - Spanish Sun 4. Zyon Base - Ghetto Blues 5. Bachelors Of Science - Strings Track 6. Bachelors Of Science - Strings Track (Apex Remix) 7. Blu Mar Ten Vs Erykah Badu - You Got Me (Remix) 8. Saburuko and Mixmaster Doc - Copperhead 9. Well Being - Smoke Screen 10. Bachelors Of Science - People Together

item.title: D&BA: Mixmaster Doc
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Mixmaster Doc has burst onto the scene almost overnight, swiftly gaining support from leading figures such as Doc Scott, Fabio, Bailey and Randall. With releases on 31 Records & Diverse Products and forthcoming tracks on Creative Source, Sonorous, Mac II, Brand Nu and Nu Directions the future is bright for the man coming straight out of South Carolina. His D&BA podcast takes you on a journey through deeper, cutting edge sounds from peers such as Spectrasoul, Icicle, Lynx, Nu Tone, Lenzman and the Doc himself. Essential listening.
Tracklist:
1. Peyo ft sks - Without U 2. Spectrasoul - Adoration 3. Nymfo and Proxima - Knock Knock > Total Science - Make Me Feel 4. Lenzman - Caught Up 5. Hobzee and Zyon Base - Sad Song 6. Insight - Never Always 7. Lynx and Aaron Jay - Wait For Me 8. Spectrasoul - Submission 9. Nutone - Troopers 10. Icicle and Nymfo - Green Goblin > Zinc and Eksman - Drive By Car 11. Generic and Perpetuum - Medicina 12. Mixmaster Doc - My Tongue is Poison 13. Hobzee - What Else 14. Peyo - That's What You Do To Me (Random Movement Remix) 15. Random Movement - Psychodelic Drainpipe 16. Mixmaster Doc -Trip 17. Mixmaster Doc and Focus - Strike at the Wind 18. Mixmaster Doc - Macrophage 19. Mixmaster Doc - She Dances 20. item.title: D&BA: Randall J-Tek Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
J-Tek is a new project with the aim to bring back the long lost sound of Jungle Techno. The project is a collaboration between Outrage (Backlash, Metalheadz, Basement Records), Digital (Function, Timeless, Metalheadz), Modular (HardLeaders, Flex, Lab Logic), Aperture (Whisper Audio, Metalheadz, Paradox Music), and the original jungle don Randall (Mac II, Metalheadz, Reinforced). As a special introduction Randall drops this label mix featuring brand new tracks alongside vintage Jungle Tekno from the likes of Lennie De Ice...it's time to get to know about the J-Tek sound!
Tracklist:
1. Living In A Basement - Modular - J-Tek Records 2. The Buck Stops Here - Modular - J-Tek Records 3. Jungle Dub - Modular - J-Tek Records 4. Acid Drop - Outrage - J-Tek Records 5. Work the Box - Potential Bad Boy - Limited E Edition 6. Falling Bombs - Modular & Outrage - J-Tek Records 7. Sunday Morning - Allsorts - Outrage & Modular(RMX) - J-Tek Records 8. Cry - Outrage - J-Tek Records 9. We I E - Lennie De-Ice - Reel 2 Reel 10. Made In England - Outrage & Digital - J-Tek Records 11. Scorcher - 4 Hero - Reinforced Records 12. Gladiator - Modular - J-Tek Records 13. Charm - De-Men-Tation- Bassmentation 14. Dark NRG - Modular - J-Tek Records 15. Utopia - Outrage - J-Tek Records 16. 2012 - Modular - J-Tek Records 17. Stop! - Outrage - J-Tek Records 18. Escape - Aperture - J-Tek Records

item.title: D&BA: Nero
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Ahead of the very special World Of Drum & Bass meets Drum & Bass Arena event in Miami in March, Nero set pulses racing in anticipation with a ferocious mix of upfront DnB pressure. The duo, signed to Formation since 2004 and responsible for last year's electro-step anthem 'Energy', are also set to launch their own imprint 'Punchy Recordings' this year. Check out the mix featuring the forthcoming tracks from their new label, 'Solid Air' and 'Choices', as well as recent dance floor anthems from fellow leaders of the new skool Culture Shock, Sub Focus and Brookes Brothers.
Tracklist:
1. NERO - Solid Air - Punchy Recordings 2. Greenlaw - After I'm Gone (NERO Remix) - Formation >>>>Sub Focus - Swamp Thing - RAM 3. Danny Byrd - Shock Out - Hospital 4. Justice - DVNO (NERO Bootleg) - White >>>>Sub Focus - X Ray - Ram 5. Brookes Brothers - F-Zero - BBK 6. Drumsound and Bassline Smith - Harder Faster - Tecnique 7. NERO - Energy VIP - White 8. Grace & Klaxons - Its Not over Yet (NERO Bootleg) - White 9. Brookes Brothers - The Lost Track - No release 10. NERO - Electronics - White 11. Culture Shock & Brookes Brothers - Rework - Ram 12. Sub Focus - Druggy - Ram 13. Common - The Light (Brookes Brothers Bootleg) - White 14. ShockOne feat Elisha King - Don't You Know - Viper 15. Chino - Insatiable - New Identity 16. Brookes Brothers & Futurebound - Dawn Treader - BBK 17. NERO - Choices - Punchy Recordings

item.title: D&BA: DJ Steppa and Tonn Piper
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Fresh off the back of his recent signing to G Dub's Propaganda Recordings, Best Breakthrough DJ at last years Drum & Bass Awards DJ Steppa knocks up a killer concoction of big beats and even bigger basslines for our brand new podcast. The Leeds-based DJ has been one of the North's leading DnB figures, from his early days working at Flex Recordings through to recent releases on the likes of Radius and Blueprint, not to mention his hectic DJing schedule and weekly Radio Frequency shows. Joined by one of Manchester's finest MC Tonn Piper on hosting duties, this fast and frenetic mix is guaranteed to get you moving. Check it!
Tracklist:
1. Heist - Ambush - Co-Lab 2. Taxman - Scan Darker - Ganja 3. Chase & Status - Hurt You - Ram 4. Original Sin - Cheater Cheater - Ganja 5. Clipz - Download (VIP) - Audio Zoo 6. Hazard & D-Minds - Mr Happy - Playaz 7. Dillinja - Make It Work - Valve 8. Clipz - Rubbish (VIP) - Audio Zoo 9. Friction - 3rd Degree Gurns - Valve 10. Original Sin - Don't Be Silly - Ganja 11. High Contrast - If We Ever - Hospital 12. Lynx - Disco Dodo - Creative Source 13. Friction & Nu-Balance - Robocop (Taxman Remix) - Playaz 14. Steppa & Kitcha - The Business - Blueprint

item.title: D&BA: Evil Quest and Juiceman
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Skimrock Project 1 label boss & producer Evil Quest is a name to watch out for this year with some killer jump up releases in the pipeline. Also working closely with Kenny Ken’s Mix N Blen’ imprint and the Digital Project the future is bright for this Midlands based producer. If you like your beats raw & your basslines dutty buckle up and sit tight for this heavyweight session.

item.title: D&BA: Subwave Studio Mix
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: Meet Subwave, Russia's most versatile producer and dj, newest addition to the Metalheadz family. Goldie was so impressed with Subwave's music that he made him first non-UK artist to have a release on prestigious Metalheadz Platinum imprint, alongside D-Bridge, Klute, Calyx and Total Science. Subwave takes us on exclusive journey through some of the most forward thinking drum&bass to hit the shelves in 2008. You heard it here first!

item.title: D&BA: DJ Basher
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: DJ Basher has swiftly risen through the ranks since receiving the call from Ram head honcho Andy C signing him to sister label Frequency Records. After his first release as part of the Ram fraternity, ‘Leachcraft’ he has gone on to release another big Frequency 12” ‘The Ark’ plus a 12” for Bailey’s Intasound. With his next huge Frequency release, ‘Speckled Frog / Missile’, ready to drop early next year, Basher is soon set to be the next fully fledged member of the prestigious Ram artist roster, joining the likes of Noisia, Xample, Sub Focus and Chase & Status along the way. Check this new podcast as Basher rolls out an hour of fresh beats from the likes of the Ram camp plus Hive, Spor, TC, Ed Rush & Optical, Hazard and more.

item.title: D&BA: DJ B.Traits & MC GQ
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: B.Traits began making a name for herself in Vancouver, Canada in 2004 through her frequent dancefloor assaults on unsuspecting clubs across the Pacific Northwest. By the age of 21 she had already played alongside DnBís finest from North America and across Europe and, after teaming up with MC Kay to form Ladies Take Control (LTC), began to perform as part of DJ SSí legendary Formation crew. 2006 and 2007 saw the duo embark on Formationís World Of Drum & Bass tour and more recently B Traits has caught the eye of Shy FX and his Digital Soundboy camp, becoming the first official Digital Sound girl. Here she drops her very exclusive first Digital Soundboy mix alongside the mighty MC GQ. Packed full of fresh exclusives and unreleased dubs this mix is not to be missed. Also watch out for her first Digital Soundboy outingís in 2008.

item.title: D&BA: Hype Interview
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Early is not a word often used in the music industry, but early it had to be to catch 1Xtra's DJ of the year, Hype, before he disappeared off to Bordeaux, as he runs through the mixing and making of this chart topping, heavy weight mix album from Drum & Bass Arena.
The mix includes exclusives such as Hazard's Busted (Hype special mix), TC Ft. Jakes Raising the Roof (Hype Special mix) and unreleased material with Lynx's Disco Dodo, Dillinja's Tunnel Grinder, Friction and Nu Balance's Robocop (Taxman Remix) along with the biggest and best tunes that define a huge year for Drum & Bass.

item.description:
Head Honcho Mr Silver, owner and founder of Nemesis Recordings and Science Fiction Records (and also from one of the best duos in DnB: Accidental Heroes / Sonic & Silver) teams up with one of L.A.s rising stars of the DnB scene; MC Dino. item.description:
Mutated Forms are certainly making their mark on the UK scene with a string of strong releases on labels such as Formation, Low Down Deep, World Of Drum & Bass & Zombie.
Rolling out the next chapter in our weekly podcasts, the trio showcase their versatility alongside MC Coppa with a high-speed journey through their dance floor friendly sound from wobbly liquid through to techy jump up this crew have got it all.

item.title: D&BA: Saburuko
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: Representing Brooklyn, NY, by way of the UK, Russell Knight and Edward Parker are currently signed exclusively to the Horizons Music Group. One of the leaders of the new skool they have been gaining major support from A-Listers such as Fabio, Grooverider, LTJ Bukem and Flight amongst others for a host of top-notch releases over the past year. Check out the Saburuko sounds for yourself on our latest D&B Arena Podcast.

item.title: D&BA: Aaron Jay
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: After three and half years as a Swerve resident, Aaron Jay is about to launch a new label in the new year; ‘Influence Records’. The label will be showcasing a deeper side to the drum and bass spectrum whilst also pushing new artist from around the globe. Artists already signed to the label are studio partner Lynx (Soul:r, Creative Source), ICR from Hungary, Kjell (Creative Source) and new boy Brother. Other artists expected to grace the label are RawQ (New York), Mixmaster Doc (New York, 31 Records), Naibu (Paris, Creative Source), Soul Intent and Eveson (Creative Source, 31 Records).
item.itunes:subtitle: In this exclusive dub mix, Swerve resident Aaron Jay showcases the kind of vibes that will be on his forthcoming label 'Influence Records'.
item.itunes:summary: After three and half years as a Swerve resident, Aaron Jay is about to launch a new label in the new year; ‘Influence Records’. item.title: D&BA: Phace
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Firmly at the forefront of Neurofunk's evolution, Phace is comprised of two long time friends Florian and Nicolas both twenty seven years of age, they hail from South-West Germany. Since forming in 1999, they have been dedicated, some would say addicted, to refining their unique sound.
The very definition of cutting-edge music.
item.itunes:subtitle: The very definition of cutting-edge music, brought to you by Phace.

item.title: D&BA: Defcom Records / Osiris Music
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Since establishing Defcom Records in 1999 Kryptic Minds & Leon Switch have been at the forefront of the deeper & darker side of Drum & Bass, renowned for their consistently high quality output and unique sounds. Now in 2007, Defcom continues its quality string of releases and recently saw the release of the duo’s critically acclaimed debut LP, ‘Lost All Faith’. This breathtaking epic had everyone from Adam F to Paradox talking and was hailed as one of Drum & Bass’s defining albums and a future classic.
Meanwhile Defcom’s fledgling sister label, Osiris, continues to go from strength to strength with new skool artists such as Sabre and Survival leading the charge.
In this exclusive Drum & bass Arena Podcast Kryptic Minds & Leon Switch guide listeners on a journey through the Defcom & Osiris sound, showcasing forthcoming cuts from the labels alongside some of ‘Lost All Faith’s’ highlights and Defcoms biggest releases.
item.itunes:subtitle: A journey through the Defcom & Osiris sound, showcasing forthcoming cuts from the labels, alongside some of ‘Lost All Faith’s’ highlights and Defcoms biggest releases.

item.title: D&BA: Bounce Records - Scheme, Roughcut and Foxy
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
"F*ck off" heralds a new era for bounce records. It's the first release since signing Roughcut exclusively to the label and serves as a warning of things to come from the camp. This Podcast showcases Bounce, its diversity, energy and Roughcuts already impressive production credits.
Bounce have plenty of new Roughcut and Foxy material lined up and with EP's due from Lomax and Roughcut along with a busy release schedule from sister labels; Jump, Deep and Bounce Digital. Expect big things from the Bounce Records crew in the future.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive Bounce Records mix. Showcasing their diversity, energy and Roughcuts already impressive production credits.

item.title: D&BA: The Qemists Feat MC ID
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Brighton trio The Qemists have been described as ' A hard stick of Brighton Rock, massive Drum n Bass bangers and a glistening stream of Jazz' so be sure to expect the unexpected as they drop an exclusive mix for the latest Drum & Bass Arena Podcast.
Between the three of them, they have worked in every musical capacity available, from remixers to live sound for the likes of Coldcut, Basement Jaxx, Dreadzone, Kano, Lady Sovereign, as well as many of the biggest names in Drum n Bass.
In 2005 their debut release on Ninja Tune, a remix of Coldcut's "Everything is under control" had massive support from Radio 1's Zane Lowe, 1Xtra's Crissy Criss, Andy C and Pendulum. Always on a mission to do something different, their 3 man, 2 deck, 2 laptop DJ set was born, bursting with double drops, live remixes and the sound of technology. Check out this exclusive mix alongside Brighton's number one MC ID.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive Qemists mix featuring Brighton's number one MC ID. Always on a mission to do something different, their 3 man, 2 deck, 2 laptop DJ set was born, bursting with double drops, live remixes and the sound of technology.

item.title: D&BA: Majistrate and Nicol feat MC Funsta
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description:
Hot on the heels of their Bingo 12” ‘Upside Down / Psychosis’, the deadly duo drop an exclusive upfront mix for our latest Drum & Bass Arena Podcast featuring forthcoming tracks alongside tried and tested bangers. Joined by the host with the most, MC Fun, buckle up tight and enjoy the ride as Nicol & Majistrate drop the bombs.
Currently tearing up dancefloors across the globe, 2007 has most definitely been Nicol & Majistrate’s year. Following killer releases on a host of labels including Low Down Deep, Frequency, Calypso and Frontline their collaborations as a production duo have been causing a storm. The launch of their brand new NAM Musik imprint this year saw the huge first single ‘The Countdown / Camel Toe’ smash up countless raves and receive massive DJ support.

item.title: D&BA: D.Kay
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: David Kulenkampff is one of the most versatile beat makers in drum & bass. Equally adept at crafting big and bashy dancefloor beasts or warm and snuggly liquid funkularity, it comes as no surprise that his debut album showcases yet another string to his breakbeat bow. Coming on like a Swerve session at Ronnie Scott's, 'Individual Soul' is an amazing selection of live jazz-spliced jungle. In this exclusive podcast, D.Kay takes you through some of the many highlights. Finger clicking is essential.
item.itunes:subtitle: Coming on like a Swerve session at Ronnie Scott's, D.Kay's debut 'Individual Soul' is an amazing selection of live jazz-spliced jungle. The man himself takes you through some of the many highlights.

item.title: D&BA: DJ Andy - Emotif Recordings
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: Sao Paulo's Anderson Cepeda is one of the most important figures in the Brazilian drum & bass scene, constantly pushing the sound to wider audiences and playing some of the biggest parties in South America. He's also not bad at putting a tune together, as releases on Phuturistic Bluez and Emotif will attest to. This exclusive podcast mix for Drum&BassArena showcases exactly why he's been an essential cog in the scene across the Atlantic for so many years, drawing on some fresh beats, and old material to construct this heavy dancefloor mixdown. Listen and understand.

item.title: D&BTV: A Gathering at Global Part 2
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: The humor heats up with Crissy discovering academy award winner Joseph from Gloucester, Profile meets up with a Welsh Justin Timberlake whilst Sub Focus and Grooverider bring down the Accelerated tent. There's a serious debate on whether they should introduce nappies for ravers and do away with toilets at festivals and 'Spinning John the Phenomenon' wishes he'd bought his Renault 5 GT.

item.title: D&BTV: A Gathering at Global Part 1
item.itunes:author: Drum&BassArena
item.description: Crissy and Profile are back for more festival fun at Global Gathering. Nicky BM gives us the low down on his set and the up-for-it crowd. Profile goes on safari to the main stage, spots a microphone licking welshman and finds Wally. Brockie rinses out the beats with Det and Skibba on the mic and finally, after 3 takes, Profile gets his interview with him (watch out for the confused raver) and finishes off with a young one who loves D&B but didn't realize there was any at Global... bizarre!
item.itunes:subtitle: Crissy and Profile are back for more festival fun at Global Gathering.
item.itunes:summary: Crissy and Profile are back for more festival fun at Global Gathering. Nicky BM gives us the low down on his set and the up-for-it crowd. item.itunes:keywords: global gathering, profile, crissy criss, blackmarket, brockie, det, Skibadee

item.title: D&BTV: Innovation In The Sun 2006 Part 1

The comedy begins...
